title: Spiced cod flatbreads with preserved lemon and avocado salsa, pul biber onions and harissa yoghurt
description: A vibrant dish of spiced cod with spicy yoghurt and zesty salsa all wrapped up in a crisp, garlicky flatbread.
ingredients: 5cm/2in piece fresh turmeric, peeled and finely grated
300g/10½oz sustainable cod loin, cut into 2.5cm/1in chunks
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 preserved lemons, deseeded and very finely chopped
1 small red onion, very thinly sliced
1 heaped tsp of pul biber chilli flakes (Turkish pepper), plus extra for garnish
